languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}," {n}— трескучий голос регента разрезает тишину, —{/n} "от имени Дома Орселлио позвольте выразить крайнее удовлетворение нашей встречей — и благодарность за {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_GrandWelcome}радушный прием{/d}. Приятно знать, что не перевелись в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g} господа, чтущие этикет и традиции гостеприимства".

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}," {n}- трескучий голос регента разрезает тишину, -{/n} "от имени Дома Орселлио позвольте выразить крайнее удовлетворение нашей встречей — и благодарность за радушный прием. Приятно знать, что не перевелись в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g} господа, чтущие этикет и традиции гостеприимства".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}," {n}the regent's piercing voice cuts through the silence,{/n} "on behalf of House Orsellio, we would like to express our immense satisfaction at this meeting — and our gratitude for the {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_GrandWelcome}warm welcome{/d}. It pleases us to know there are still {mf|lords|ladies} in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} who observe etiquette and the traditions of hospitality."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}," {n}— трескучий голос регента разрезает тишину, —{/n} "от имени Дома Орселлио позвольте выразить крайнее удовлетворение нашей встречей — и благодарность за {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_GrandWelcome}радушный прием{/d}. Приятно знать, что не перевелись в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g} господа, чтущие этикет и традиции гостеприимства".

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}," {n}- the regent's cracking voice cuts through the silence, -{/n} "on behalf of House Orsellio I would like to express my extreme satisfaction with our meeting — and gratitude for the warm welcome. It pleases me to know there are still {mf|lords|ladies} in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} who honor etiquette and the traditions of hospitality."

It pleases us to know there are still {mf|lords|ladies} in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} who observe etiquette and the traditions of hospitality."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。”{n}摄政王刺耳的声音打破了沉默。{/n}“我们谨代表奥赛罗家族，对这次会面表示无比满意。我们对你们的{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_GrandWelcome}热情{/d}非常感激。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}依然有{mf|领主|领主女士}愿意遵守礼节与好客的传统，这令我们非常开心。”
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}," {n}the regent's piercing voice cuts through the silence,{/n} "on behalf of House Orsellio, we would like to express our immense satisfaction at this meeting — and our gratitude for the {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_GrandWelcome}warm welcome{/d}. It pleases us to know there are still {mf|lords|ladies} in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} who observe etiquette and the traditions of hospitality."

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。”{n}摄政王刺耳的声音打破了沉默。{/n}“我们谨代表奥塞罗家族，对这次会面表示无比满意。我们对你们的热情非常感激。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}依然有{mf|领主|领主女士}愿意遵守礼节与好客的传统，这令我们非常开心。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}». {n}La voz del regente atraviesa el silencio.{/n} «En nombre de la casa Orsellio, queremos expresar la inmensa satisfacción que nos causa este encuentro y {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_GrandWelcome}nuestro agradecimiento{/d} por la cálida bienvenida. Nos alegra ver que todavía queda alguien en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} que sabe en qué consisten la etiqueta y las tradiciones de la hospitalidad».
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}," {n}the regent's piercing voice cuts through the silence,{/n} "on behalf of House Orsellio, we would like to express our immense satisfaction at this meeting — and our gratitude for the {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_GrandWelcome}warm welcome{/d}. It pleases us to know there are still {mf|lords|ladies} in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} who observe etiquette and the traditions of hospitality."

traits.locale_text: «{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}». {n}La voz del regente atraviesa el silencio.{/n} «En nombre de la casa Orsellio, queremos expresar la inmensa satisfacción que nos causa este encuentro y nuestro agradecimiento por la cálida bienvenida. Nos alegra ver que todavía queda alguien en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} que sabe en qué consisten la etiqueta y las tradiciones de la hospitalidad».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}」{n}摂政の鋭い声が静寂を切り裂く。{/n}「オーセリオ家を代表して、この出会いに大変満足していること…そして{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_GrandWelcome}温かい歓迎{/d}に感謝していることをお伝えしたい。礼儀作法ともてなしの伝統を守る者がまだ{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}に存在することを知り、嬉しく思っている」
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}," {n}the regent's piercing voice cuts through the silence,{/n} "on behalf of House Orsellio, we would like to express our immense satisfaction at this meeting — and our gratitude for the {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_GrandWelcome}warm welcome{/d}. It pleases us to know there are still {mf|lords|ladies} in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} who observe etiquette and the traditions of hospitality."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}」{n}摂政の鋭い声が静寂を切り裂く。{/n}「オーセリオ家を代表して、この出会いに大変満足していること…そして{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_GrandWelcome}温かい歓迎{/d}に感謝していることをお伝えしたい。礼儀作法ともてなしの伝統を守る者がまだ{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}に存在することを知り、嬉しく思っている」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}", {n}zerteilt die schneidende Stimme des Regenten die Stille,{/n} "im Namen des Hauses Orsellio möchten wir unsere enorme Zufriedenheit mit diesem Treffen zum Ausdruck bringen – und unsere Dankbarkeit für die {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_GrandWelcome}freundliche Begrüßung{/d}. Es erfreut uns, dass es noch {mf|Lords|Ladys} in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} gibt, denen Etikette und die Traditionen der Gastfreundschaft etwas gelten."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}," {n}the regent's piercing voice cuts through the silence,{/n} "on behalf of House Orsellio, we would like to express our immense satisfaction at this meeting — and our gratitude for the {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_GrandWelcome}warm welcome{/d}. It pleases us to know there are still {mf|lords|ladies} in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} who observe etiquette and the traditions of hospitality."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}", {n}zerteilt die schneidende Stimme des Regenten die Stille,{/n} "im Namen des Hauses Orsellio möchten wir unsere enorme Zufriedenheit mit diesem Treffen zum Ausdruck bringen – und unsere Dankbarkeit für die freundliche Begrüßung. Es erfreut uns, dass es noch {mf|Lords|Ladys} in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} gibt, denen Etikette und die Traditionen der Gastfreundschaft etwas gelten."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}{/g}, {n}vous salue le régent d'une voix perçante qui vient briser le silence.{/n} Au nom de la maison Orsellio, permettez-moi de vous exprimer notre profonde satisfaction de vous rencontrer, et notre gratitude pour votre {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_GrandWelcome}accueil si chaleureux{/d}. Quel plaisir de voir qu'il existe encore dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} des {mf|seigneurs|dames} qui respectent l'étiquette et les traditions de l'hospitalité. »
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}," {n}the regent's piercing voice cuts through the silence,{/n} "on behalf of House Orsellio, we would like to express our immense satisfaction at this meeting — and our gratitude for the {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_GrandWelcome}warm welcome{/d}. It pleases us to know there are still {mf|lords|ladies} in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} who observe etiquette and the traditions of hospitality."

traits.locale_text: « {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}{/g}, {n}vous salue le régent d'une voix perçante qui vient briser le silence.{/n} Au nom de la maison Orsellio, permettez-moi de vous exprimer notre profonde satisfaction de vous rencontrer, et notre gratitude pour votre accueil si chaleureux. Quel plaisir de voir qu'il existe encore dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} des {mf|seigneurs|dames} qui respectent l'étiquette et les traditions de l'hospitalité. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir.{/g}" {n}Naibin keskin sesi, sessizliği delip geçiyor.{/n} "Orsellio Hanesi adına böyle bir görüşme gerçekleştiriyor olmaktan muazzam ölçüde memnuniyet duyduğumuzu ifade etmemize izin verin. Bu {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_GrandWelcome}sıcak karşılamadan{/d} da elbette. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nde{/g} hâlâ adabımuaşerete ve konukseverlik geleneklerine değer veren {mf|beyefendilerin|hanımefendilerin} bulunduğunu görmek mutluluk verici."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}," {n}the regent's piercing voice cuts through the silence,{/n} "on behalf of House Orsellio, we would like to express our immense satisfaction at this meeting — and our gratitude for the {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_GrandWelcome}warm welcome{/d}. It pleases us to know there are still {mf|lords|ladies} in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} who observe etiquette and the traditions of hospitality."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir.{/g}" {n}Naibin keskin sesi, sessizliği delip geçiyor.{/n} "Orsellio Hanesi adına böyle bir görüşme gerçekleştiriyor olmaktan muazzam ölçüde memnuniyet duyduğumuzu ifade etmemize izin verin. Bu sıcak karşılamadan da elbette. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'nde hâlâ adabımuaşerete ve konukseverlik geleneklerine değer veren {mf|beyefendilerin|hanımefendilerin} bulunduğunu görmek mutluluk verici."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
